body:
If you want an input to be revealed on a page only when a user selects a particular answer, add an additional component.

This is also known as 'conditional reveal'.

For example, you might ask whether a user has a particular piece of information. They could choose 'Yes' or 'No' from a radio list.

If they choose 'Yes', they would then see a text field on the same page to enter the information. 

## How to add an additional component

1. Navigate to the page where you want to add the additional component
2 .Under 'Components', click on the component (for example, a radio list)
3. Under 'Items', click on the item (for example, the answer 'Yes' in a radio list)
4. Under 'Additional components', click on 'Add additional component')
heading: Additional components
